            • com.datumbox.framework.machinelearning.ensemblelearning.BayesianEnsembleMethod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Trainable<BayesianEnsembleMethod.ModelParameters,BayesianEnsembleMethod.TrainingParameters>

    public class BayesianEnsembleMethod
extends BaseNaiveBayes<BayesianEnsembleMethod.ModelParameters,BayesianEnsembleMethod.TrainingParameters,BayesianEnsembleMethod.ValidationMetrics>
    Implementation of Bayesian Ensemble Method. This algorithm can be used to combine the responses of multiple different classifiers into one strong classifier. References: http://www.stanford.edu/class/cs124/lec/sentiment.pptx
    Author:
    Vasilis Vryniotis

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BayesianEnsembleMethod.ModelParameters
      The ModelParameters class stores the coefficients that were learned during the training of the algorithm.
      static class  BayesianEnsembleMethod.TrainingParameters
      The TrainingParameters class stores the parameters that can be changed before training the algorithm.
      static class  BayesianEnsembleMethod.ValidationMetrics
      The ValidationMetrics class stores information about the performance of the algorithm.
